Suicide Watch Observation Log
Name of Inmate on watch: Epstein Reg #: 76318054 Date: 7/23/19
Time Observations: Briefly note your observations. Initial all entries. Initials
7:00am Inmate comfortable, cooperative (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
7:15am Inmate Epstein sitting at edge of his bed, pensieve, lost in thought (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
7:30am Inmate Epstein sitting at the edge of his bed, pensieve. (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
7:45am Inmate Epstein walked to toilet paper (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
7:48am Inmate Epstein sitting on the edge of his bed, pensieve (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
7:51am Inmate Epstein laid down (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
8:00am Inmate laying on his side, appeared to be asleep (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
8:12am Inmate Epstein walked to asked for toilet paper (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
8:15am Inmate Epstein sitting at the edge of his bed (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
8:23am Inmate Epstein asked to speak with his attorney (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
8:30am Inmate Epstein sitting on the edge of his bed (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Note to all observers: Legibly print and sign your name at the beginning of your shift.
